mapper.insert: INSERT INTO InpatientRecord ( ResidentHealthCardID, InstitutionCode, AdmissionNumber, AdmissionConditionCode, TotalHospitalizationCost, DiagnosisDate ) VALUES ( #{residentHealthCardID}, #{institutionCode}, #{admissionNumber}, #{admissionConditionCode}, #{totalHospitalizationCost}, #{diagnosisDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE InpatientRecord SET ResidentHealthCardID = #{residentHealthCardID}, InstitutionCode = #{institutionCode}, AdmissionNumber = #{admissionNumber}, AdmissionConditionCode = #{admissionConditionCode}, TotalHospitalizationCost = #{totalHospitalizationCost}, DiagnosisDate = #{diagnosisDate} WHERE AdmissionRecordID = #{admissionRecordID}
